titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for Elk Presbyterian Church (Peck, Mich.) records, 1888-1972
titlestmt.author: Collection processed and finding aid created by Michigan Historical Collections staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created by Thomas E. Powers, 2009
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid prepared using Describing Archives: A Content Standard (DACS)

change.item: Original encoding from Word 2003 file using Word macros and Xmetal.

did.abstract: Peck, Michigan, Presbyterian Church; minutes of congregation, trustees, and sessions.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The records came from the Lake Huron Presbytery of the United Presbyterian Church (donor no. 4650).

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is not held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Elk Presbyterian Church (Peck, Mich.) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Elk Presbyterian Church in Peck, Michigan was organized September 2, 1888. The church dissolved December 31, 1972.

scopecontent.p: The record group contains session minutes, minutes of trustees, and community center records.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.corpname: United Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A.--Michigan--Peck.

did.unittitle: Session records, 1888-1919; includes minutes, lists of members and other vital records
Minutes of congregational meetings, 1889-1908; includes financial records to 1921
Community Center records, April 7, 1918-1938; includes minutes, financial records and vital records
Minutes of Trustee meetings and Congregational meeting held by the trustees, 1896-1916
Session records,1913-1952 ; includes minutes, membership lists, baptisms
Session records, 1952-1973; includes membership lists and vital records
